mapper.update: update PaymentInfo set UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, City = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZipCode = #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PyiSn = #{pyisn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PyiSn, UsrSn, Street, City, Country, ZipCode from PaymentInfo
